About Me

BIO

So after trying a couple of other career paths in February 2020 I decided to dare myself and take the Software Engineering course in General Assembly. Learning to code wasn’t actually so different from what I was doing in the past which involved creativity, understanding the user’s needs, and collaborating with a team to achieve goals.
I'm passionate about accessibility and improving user experiences for all, and I enjoy working within a highly creative team that values openness and collaboration.
